'''Radiant Spincrystal 137''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Baba we Twasali]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in the [["Scions of the Canopy"]] Tribe in the downstairs merchant center.
